name: Duchy of Arepandia
startIntroPart1:
Buenas sumercé! Great leader of the independent duchy, your multiple public proyects that you started brought prosperity to the nation, when they were finished, that is...
But the will of the people makes the nation move foward and keep up with the strongest of oponents.
startIntroPart2:
We'll defend from the attack
Altough our nation may be halved
We'll resist the whack
'Til Triumph you shall have.
introduction: Buenas sumercé, how are ya? Wanna a tad bit of coffee?
declaringWar: *Alright God, please not another Stalingrad battle*
afterPeace:
So uncivilized...
oh wait... that's da name of the game...
